name: Ramshackle Reverse
description:
If you're having mouse jumping/skipping around issues with the WebGL version, try lowering your mouse polling rate (mouse manufacturer dependent) or download the build for your system.

A short first-person puzzle game using time-control mechanic. Reverse, pause, and fast-forward time on objects and yourself!

You are an archeologist looking for a rumored underground facility built by an advanced ancient civilization. You happen across one of their advanced time-control devices, and you must use it to maneuver the treacherous, crumbling enviroment.

This game was made by myself in 14 days for the Jern Jam 1.

Developers: Alecajuice

Audio: pixabay.com

Asset Packs: karboosx, Daniel Robnik
